dublinCore.dc:title: 112 S1965 IS: To amend the East Bench Irrigation District Water Contract Extension Act to permit the Secretary of the Interior to extend the contract for certain water services.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Baucus (for himself and Mr. Tester) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the East Bench Irrigation District Water Contract Extension Act to permit the Secretary of the Interior to extend the contract for certain water services.

section.header: East Bench Irrigation District contract extension
section.text: Section 2(1) of the East Bench Irrigation District Water Contract Extension Act (Public Law 112â€“139; 126 Stat. 390) is amended by striking 4 years and inserting 10 years.
